name: mcp-chrome (hangwin)
description: [项目级] Chrome MCP Server is a Chrome extension-based Model Context Protocol (MCP) server that exposes your Chrome browser functionality to AI assistants like Claude, enabling complex browser automation, content analysis, and semantic search.。来源: https://github.com/hangwin/mcp-chrome

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
Chrome MCP Server is a Chrome extension-based Model Context Protocol (MCP) server that exposes your Chrome browser functionality to AI assistants like Claude, enabling complex browser automation, content analysis, and semantic search.

来源: https://github.com/hangwin/mcp-chrome
语言: TypeScript
Stars: 10427

genes.title: 核心特性
genes.content: - **A New Visual Editor for Claude Code & Codex**, for more detail here: [VisualEditor](docs/VisualEditor.md)

name: mcp-chrome/app 模块
description: [模块级] mcp-chrome 项目的 app 模块 (source)。来源: https://github.com/hangwin/mcp-chrome

genes.title: app 模块说明
genes.content:
模块路径: app/
类型: source
文件数: 184

包含文件:
- app/chrome-extension
- app/chrome-extension/.env.example
- app/chrome-extension/LICENSE
- app/chrome-extension/README.md
- app/chrome-extension/_locales
- app/chrome-extension/_locales/de
- app/chrome-extension/_locales/de/messages.json
- app/chrome-extension/_locales/en
- app/chrome-extension/_locales/en/messages.json
- app/chrome-extension/_locales/ja
